channel.title: Pvpstore help
channel.description:
Hello, Moparscape
I have made a Pvppoint store, and it only takes away your pvppoints, but how to do, your cluescroll also goes away. i have forgot how to do this,
this i have atm. [code] if (pvppoints >= TotPrice2) { [/code]
i want so it also makes your cluescroll lower, [code] if (pvppoints, cluescroll >= TotPrice2) {[/code]
something like that?
Please help me.
Thanks, I D D S I

item.title: Pvpstore help
item.dc:creator: @I_D_D_S_I I D D S I
item.description:
@I_D_D_S_I wrote:

i know, but assault minigame shop has this: if (assaultKills >= TotPrice2) {

i dont want only assaultkills, (pvppoints)
i want also cluescroll.

Read full topic

item.title: Pvpstore help
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Learn from Delta’s assault minigame shop.

Read full topic

item.title: Pvpstore help
item.dc:creator: @I_D_D_S_I I D D S I
item.description:
@I_D_D_S_I wrote:

yes, it is possible but i dont like that realy
then you have to add many commands, like
::redphat
::bluephat
::purplephat
::ags
::zgs
::sgs
::ss
::statius
::armadyl

I will look, but ofcourse i like when people helps me with this.
Thanks, I D D S I

Read full topic

item.title: Pvpstore help
item.dc:creator: @Fight247 Fight247
item.description:
@Fight247 wrote:

i think you just shud add what trhey sayd,
and like if you do ::pvpstore ,
that you can see the commands like, Bandos 300 pvppoints.
Armadyl 450 pvppoints.
Red phat 10k pvp points

ect, that is a good way.

@I_D_D_S_I wrote:

item.title: Pvpstore help
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“winten, post:2, topic:277429”]I have failed to see a server with an accutaly pvp or pk store i suggest using commands example…

if(command.startsWith(“bandos”) && pkPoints > 300) {
pkPoints -= 300;
addItem(1077, 1);
addItem(667, 1);
addItem(1107, 1);
}
if(command.startsWith(“bandos”) && pkPoints <= 299) {
sM(“U need 300pkPoints to gain a bandos set”);
}

let me explain

if(command.startsWith(“bandos”) && pkPoints > 300) {
pkPoints -= 300;
addItem(1077, 1);
addItem(667, 1);
addItem(1107, 1);
}

if your pk points are 300 or above give player items…

if(command.startsWith(“bandos”) && pkPoints <= 299) {
sM(“U need 300pkPoints to gain a bandos set”);
}

if player pk points less than 300 “>299” send message you dont have enough pk points… and add no items hope i helpd![/quote]
Or…

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("bandos") && pkPoints > 299) { addItem(1077, 1); addItem(667, 1); addItem(1107, 1); pkPoints -= 300; } else { sendMessage("You need 300 pk points to use this command!"); }
Of course, he would have to have the pkPoints variable.

Read full topic

item.title: Pvpstore help
item.dc:creator: @winten winten
item.description:
@winten wrote:

I have failed to see a server with an accutaly pvp or pk store i suggest using commands example…

if(command.startsWith("bandos") && pkPoints > 300) { pkPoints -= 300; addItem(1077, 1); addItem(667, 1); addItem(1107, 1); } if(command.startsWith("bandos") && pkPoints <= 299) { sM("U need 300pkPoints to gain a bandos set"); }

let me explain

if(command.startsWith("bandos") && pkPoints > 300) { pkPoints -= 300; addItem(1077, 1); addItem(667, 1); addItem(1107, 1); }
if your pk points are 300 or above give player items....
if(command.startsWith("bandos") && pkPoints <= 299) { sM("U need 300pkPoints to gain a bandos set"); }
if player pk points less than 300 ">299" send message you dont have enough pk points... and add no items hope i helpd!

Read full topic
